attributes.action: Legislate to make Tax Avoidance ILLEGAL
attributes.additional_details:
We ask government to introduce Tax Avoidance legislation to make the practice unlawful.

We want parliament to ensure everyone pays their fair share and make tax avoidance a crime.

Many tax avoidance schemes exist which cost our country BILLIONS.

From wealthy overpaid millionaire professional footballers to large corporations should pay up to help our country in difficult times.

Save our country BILLIONS and make tax avoidance illegal.
